questions.text: How satisfied are you with our service?

Task-Questions.text: Is there something you have been dreaming of for a long time? Why haven't you done it yet?
What would you like to leave behind in this world?
What would you like to say to your younger self 10 years ago?
What was the last thing that you really got excited about?
Was there a personality (f.e. teachers, famous people, fictional characters) in your childhood or youth that had a particular influence on your further personal development?
Have you ever had an experience that made you change your mind about a topic that you thought would never change? What kind of experience was it?
Can you remember an experience when you felt inner peace and connection to the world and nature? What was it?
